Title: Replaces the word rape with the term sexual battery
Summary: Replaces the word rape with the term sexual battery.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the agriculture and markets law, the criminal procedure law, the civil practice law and rules, the domestic relations law, the education law, the executive law, the family court act, the general business law, the judiciary law, the labor law, the public health law, the public service law, the social services law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to replacing the word rape with the term sexual battery
